fields.description: Limit on the number of maximum user creation
fields.label: No. Of Users

fields.description: Limit on the number of emails sent per month from the site. When limit is reached, emails will become muted. They will be blocked up in email queue.
fields.label: No. Of Emails Per Month

fields.description: Limit on the maximum space the site can use (GB). For ex. to restrict space usage to 150MB, you should put value as 0.157
fields.label: Space Limit

fields.description: Email id to be displayed when limit is reached.
fields.label: Support Email

fields.description: Contact no to be displayed when limit is reached.
fields.label: Support Phone

fields.description: *When no value is entered or it is zero. It means there is no restriction
fields.label: [1] When not using a particular limit restriction, increase its value to a high no. [2]Uninstall the limit app if not using restrictions
